attributes.action: Only allow fireworks at organised displays
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks are loud and scary for so many people like the elderly, anyone with PTSD and young children just to name a few. 
Many pets are very scared of them and the wildlife, horses, cattle ect.
Time restrictions have never worked so it’s time they were silenced or for organised displays only
attributes.background: I believe that fireworks should be made silent or used only for organised displays

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
